Business.Description: Account type used for financial transactions related to business operations.

Investment.Description: Account type used for investment purposes.

ForeignCurrency.Description: Account type that allows transactions with different currency types.

Deposit.Description: Account type that earns interest on deposited funds.

Phone.Description: Payee type for phone bill payments.

Internet.Description: Payee type for internet bill payments.

Electric.Description: Payee type for electricity bill payments.

Water.Description: Payee type for water bill payments.

Gas.Description: Payee type for gas bill payments.

PlatinumUser.Description: Platinum user role with special privileges.

AccountCreditsController.Description: Controller responsible for managing account credits.

DepositAndWithdrawsController.Description: Controller responsible for managing deposit and withdrawal transactions.

LoginsController.Description: Controller responsible for managing user logins.

MoneyTransfersController.Description: Controller responsible for managing money transfers.

SupportRequestsController.Description: Controller responsible for managing support requests.

Account.Description: Represents the financial assets of a customer.

AccountCredit.Description: Credit assigned to a customer's account.

Credit.Description: A loan obtained from a financial institution.

DepositAndWithdraw.Description: Record representing deposit and withdrawal transactions on an account.

Login.Description: Record representing a user's login in the system.

MoneyTransfer.Description: Transaction representing the transfer of money between accounts.

Payee.Description: Person or organization who is the recipient in a payment or transfer.

SupportRequest.Description: Support request submitted by a customer.

Description.Description: A description associated with an item or record..

Balance.Description: The current balance in the account.

Salary.Description: The monthly salary of the individual.

BankScore.Description: The score assigned to the individual by the bank.

TotailDailyTransferAmount.Description: The total daily transfer amount allowed.

TotalAmount.Description: The total amount associated with the individual's account.

MontlyPayment.Description: The monthly payment amount for a loan.

RepaymentPeriodMonths.Description: The repayment period for a loan in months.

LoanDate.Description: The date when a loan was initiated.

PhoneNumber.Description: The phone number of the individual.

Email.Description: The email address of the individual.

DateOfBirth.Description: The date of birth of the individual.

City.Description: The city of residence of the individual.

State.Description: The state of residence of the individual.

isSucceded.Description: A boolean indicating whether an operation was successful.

LoginTime.Description: The time of the last login.

Comment.Description: A comment associated with a record.

PaymentDay.Description: The day of the month on which a payment is due.

isPayment.Description: A boolean indicating whether a payment was made.

Subject.Description: The subject of a message or communication.

isAnswered.Description: A boolean indicating whether a question or inquiry was answered.

Answered.Description: The answer provided for a question or inquiry.

AnsweredDate.Description: The date when a question or inquiry was answered.

PasswordHash.Description: The hash of a user's password.

PasswordSalt.Description: The salt used in password hashing.

RefreshToken.Description: The refresh token used in authentication.

TokenCreated.Description: The date and time when an authentication token was created.

TokenExpires.Description: The date and time when an authentication token expires.
